mapper.select: select user_id userId, user_name userName, user_password userPwd, email, join_at, img_url profileImg from members where user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into members (user_name, user_id, user_password, email, join_at) values (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, now())
